text: Tato ce uttari vāyamamānā taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ
edit: Tato ce uttari vāyamamānā taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: If she should not produce the robe (at that point), should she then produce the robe after (the bhikkhunī) has endeavored further than that, it is to be forfeited and confessed.
